title: Elon Musk Declaration Sparks Wild Speculation He Could Be About To Blow Up The Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP And Dogecoin Price
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Traders are braced for mercurial billionaire Elon Musk to lob a grenade into the crypto market...

title: Forbes Blockchain 50 2023
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Despite 2022’s crypto market collapse, dozens of enterprises around the world are still investing in blockchain, the distributed-database technology that underpins the entire sector because it helps their businesses operate better, faster or cheaper.

title: The Secretive World Of MEV, Where Bots Front-Run Crypto Investors For Big Profits
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: True believers say crypto is more transparent than traditional finance. Yet that openness—combined with clunky infrastructure and an absence of regulation–lets crypto trading firms with lightning-fast bots prey on unsuspecting retail traders.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Legal Defense Is Being Funded With Alameda Money He Gifted His Father
author: Sarah Emerson
description: While still CEO of now-collapsed FTX, Bankman-Fried transferred millions of dollars to his father. Some of those funds have since been used to pay for his mounting legal fees, according to two sources close to the company.

title: The 10 Biggest Fintech Companies In America 2022
author: Isabel Contreras
description: Fintech’s mightiest privately owned companies continued to grow over the past year, but declining investment in the industry signals stormy waters ahead.

title: Fintech 50 2022: The Newcomers
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: For our seventh annual Fintech 50, 25 of our picks have never appeared on the list. Crypto companies and startups trying to make banking cheaper and more accessible for small businesses made a particularly strong showing.

title: Crypto Investing—A New Investor's Guide
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Crypto investing is much more than just buying bitcoin. There are a range of options depending on your risk appetite. This guide will help you get started.

title: How Did Sam Bankman-Fried’s Alameda Research Lose So Much Money?
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: Through interviews with top crypto traders and investors, we pieced together the leading theories on how crypto exchange FTX’s sister trading firm lost billions of dollars.

title: Amid Crypto Bank Crisis, Fidelity Expands Bitcoin, Ether Trading To Most Retail  Accounts
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Coins cannot be transferred out of accounts. Trading touted as commission free, but there’s a 1% spread.

title: ‘Bloodbath’—Sudden $1 Trillion Crypto Crash Sparks Fresh Coinbase Warning And Tanks The Price Of Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Cardano, Dogecoin, Polygon And Solana
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Crypto's latest crash comes as one of the top global credit rating agencies, Moody's, dropped its outlook on embattled bitcoin and crypto exchange Coinbase from stable to negative—signaling further declines to come...

title: Forget Art, Let’s Trade: How A 10-Person Startup Came To Dominate NFT Markets
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: While NFT sales declined over the past year, a new trader-focused NFT marketplace quietly dethroned OpenSea as market leader.

title: Bankman-Fried Warns: Some Crypto Exchanges Already “Secretly Insolvent”
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: After throwing lifelines to troubled digital currency exchanges BlockFi and Voyager Digital, Sam Bankman-Fried, the 30-year-old billionaire founder of FTX, warns that many crypto exchanges will soon fail.

title: Crossing The Crypto Threshold: Brazil’s NuBank Launches Nucoin
author: Meaghan Johnson
description: HEADLINER Brazil's Nubank has made headlines this week with the launch of its very own cryptocurrency, Nucoin.

title: Stripe, Deloitte, Sullivan & Cromwell Are Among 53 FTX Advisors, Vendors And Bankers Weathering Exchange’s Collapse
author: Javier Paz
description: Relative to other crypto exchanges, transparency and regulatory compliance were virtues for Bankman-Fried’s FTX.  Here’s a glimpse of the exchange’s operations, according to its own general counsel, as of August 2022.

title: 11 Stocks To Invest In Crypto Without Buying Crypto Directly
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: Are you looking to invest in cryptocurrency but aren’t sure it’s the right choice for you? These 11 stocks allow you to invest in crypto without limiting your selections to just one or two coins.

title: The IRS Is Working On A New Tax Form To Capture Your Crypto Activity
author: Shehan Chandrasekera
description: The IRS is reportedly working on introducing a brand new tax form called Form 1099-DA for exchanges to capture individual annual cryptocurrency activity subject to taxation.

title: Crypto Braced For A $24 Billion Earthquake After SEC Bombshell Hit The Price Of Bitcoin And Ethereum
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Crypto traders are scrambling to adjust their portfolios ahead of platforms "delisting" many major cryptocurrencies from some big trading platforms...

description: A Handful of Banks, Each With Tens of Trillions in Assets Under Custody May (or May Not) Give Nod to Project Ion

title: Coinbase Will Pay $100 Million After Regulators Find 'Significant Failures' Heightened Risk Of Criminal Activity
author: Jonathan Ponciano
description: Regulators allege Coinbase "did the bare minimum" to verify customer information and overlooked information that was "on its face clearly inaccurate."

title: Does Anyone Want To Buy Robinhood?
author: Jason Bisnoff
description: In under a year, retail brokerage juggernaut Robinhood has lost more than $50 billion in market capitalization. Are its languishing shares a bargain for potential acquirers?

title: Crypto Winter Hasn’t Stopped Billionaire Steven Cohen’s Firm From Investing In DeFi
author: Rosemarie Miller
description: Point72, the venture firm run by the inspiration for the ‘Billions’ TV-show, Steve Cohen, is now officially no longer just dabbling in crypto.

title: Billions Of FTX Assets In Limbo As Exchange Follows Voyager Into Bankruptcy

description: Binance places a huge bet on free bitcoin trading to boost the visibility of its trading volume at the expense of the firm's profitability. Will other firms follow?

title: $173 Million Tether Short Nearly Triple Original Following FTX-Binance Deal Collapse

description: “Hacker” Avraham Eisenberg made $100 million exploiting a “highly profitable trading strategy” on the Mango decentralized exchange. Now he’s out to do the same with the FTX fire sale.

title: Robinhood Shares Jump 14%, Trading Halted After Report That Crypto Exchange FTX Could Buy The Company

title: Will Coinbase Survive Amid The Crypto Chaos?

description: Coinbase is suspending their affiliate program in a bid to cut costs, which has been labeled by some market commentators as a "big red flag."

description: Lending platform also sues Bankman-Fried company, reportedly to obtain Robinhood shares, in alleged separate default.

description: While cryptocurrency prices continue to sag, crypto billionaire Sam Bankman-Fried is making all the right moves in preparation for a transformative takeover.

description: U.S. Justice Department nabs Robinhood shares that Bankman-Fried says are his.

title: Silvergate Stock Crashes Over 40% As Bank Grapples With Crypto Crisis
author: Derek Saul
description: Customers withdrew more than $8 billion from the crypto-focused bank over the last three months of 2022.

title: Crypto Stocks Trade Down But Avoid Major Collapses On Volatile Day
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Bitcoin proxies weathered downward pressure from the FTX collapse but a failed rescue attempt could paint a different picture on Thursday

title: ‘An Important Milestone’—Bitcoin And Crypto Giant Binance Reveals Ethereum Price Game-Changer Ahead Of Major Upgrade
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Binance, the world's largest crypto exchange by volume, has revealed it's expanding its fee-free trading to include ethereum in the run-up to and aftermath of ethereum's merge upgrade...

title: The Best Crypto Exchanges: Forbes Call For Fall 2022 Nominations
author: Javier Paz
description: Building on the success of the Forbes’ Spring 2022 ranking of 60 crypto exchanges, the list will compare the financial firms that most investors trust to access tens of billions of dollars in crypto holdings and derivatives across 10 categories.

title: Robinhood Hit With $30 Million Fine
author: Rosemarie Miller
description: The New York State Department of financial services fines Robinhood in its first crypto enforcement action.

title: ‘This Is Going To Blow Up’—Top VC Issues Dire Prediction After Terra Luna-Led Crash Wiped $2 Trillion From Bitcoin, Ethereum And Crypto Market Price
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Fears are growing among the investment community that the U.S. securities watchdog could pursue legal action against venture capitalists who knowingly sold hollow digital assets to retail investors...

title: Crypto 1.0’s Original Regulator Is Preparing For Web3
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: The NYDFS came out with the very first piece of crypto-specific regulation back in 2014. In this interview, Superintendent Adrienne Harris breaks down what the organization has learned in the intervening years and how it is preparing for the next evolution in crypto.

title: Crypto Exchanges Set Their Sights On The Sleepy Futures Industry
author: Javier Paz
description: Borrowing a page from the way in which Silicon Valley-funded startups disrupted U.S. brokerage markets, crypto exchanges are doing the same with U.S. futures, an industry that has consolidated sharply over the years.
